name: Gravity (itch) (Asue)
description:
Hello :)

Gravity is a 2D game made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 51. The theme was "Every 10 seconds".

Your goal is to survive as long as possible by jumping from planet to planet and dodging asteroids. Be careful, every 10 seconds, a modifier is applied to the player.

Credits

-> Planets : hmc

-> Asteroids : Norma2D

-> Background image : Deep-Fold

-> Musics : Chiphead64
